casebody.data:
Krista RAGSDALE, Guardian Ad Litem for Alec Seeburger
v.
Dr. John M. WHITLEY and Cumberland County Hospital System, Inc., D/B/A Cape Fear Valley Health System No. 38P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2018 Coy E. Brewer, Jr., Allen W. Rogers, Fayetteville, Attorneys at Law, for Ragsdale, Krista GAL for Alec Seeburger Patrick M. Meacham, Michael Joseph Crook, Catherine R.L. Lawson, Attorneys at Law, Raleigh, for Whitley, John M. (Dr.), et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 5th of February 2018 by Defendants in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."
